name: 3D Frog Feast for Raspberry Pi
description:
You are a hungry frog on a mission. A mission to eat lunch. Clear each maze in this fun-filled and frog-filled action arcade game. Watch out for the snakes! Snakes are only edible after froggy eats a special power anti-acid tablet. Clear each maze and move on to the next level.

A fun casual arcade game for the whole family. Kid friendly with no harsh language or violence (unless you are an insect).

Features

  • 30 Awesome Levels
  • High-Score Table
  • Collect frog-food
  • Avoid the Snakes
  • Fun casual arcade action

Raspberry Pi is a trademark of the Raspberry Pi Foundation.
